title: Quartz & granite countertops, Yoga/spin studio & on-demand classes
posting_body: This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 617 Sq.
Introducing TriVista on Speer, offering luxury studio, one, two, and three bedroom apartments anchored in downtown Denver’s coolest corner: The Golden Triangle Creative District.
Walk to the city’s best artistic, historical, and outdoor attractions.
Take in the breathtaking mountain views.
TriVista truly satisfies your need for beauty, adventure, and escape.

Quartz & granite countertops, Tandem & private garage boxes, Two interior design schemes to choose from, 2-level parking garage, Wood-style flooring, In-home washer & dryer, Electronic lock system, Electric or gas ranges, Designer backsplash, Air conditioning & heating, Boutique-style interiors, Studio, 1-bedroom, 2-bedroom & 3-bedroom units available, Balconies & private patios, Stainless steel appliances

Outdoor lounge with TVs, Bicycle/ski repair & storage, Gameroom with pool tables, Demonstration kitchen, Car charging stations for electric vehicles, Direct access to the Cherry creek bike path, Luxurious pool & spa with lounge, Ask about furnished options, Rooftop deck with mountain, City Hall & downtown views, Dining lounge, Expansive two-story fitness facility, BBQ/dining areas, Two courtyards with firepits, Live/work townhomes available, Conference spaces & individual work stations, Pet spa & grooming station, Wine cellar, Yoga/spin studio & on-demand classes
